introduction: SYNOPSISA rumor surrounds gallant Chun-pung with fears of others. However, he readily gets into the Eul-nyeo's bedroom. Chivalrous Chun-pung loses all his wealth to a seductive hand of a woman. Helpless, he turns to Eul-nyeo for help and they live together along with his legal wife as well. He nearly gets caught by a caretaker his father has sent but is rescued by Suk-hyang and Eul-nyeo disguised as men at the last minute.故事关于hooggulchulbun的谣言被送到门口，但春蓬正在占领女孩的房间。一个强壮的勇气，有着强烈的勇气，被流传的女人的诱惑所吸引，流下了钱和房子。去女孩房子的春波不能在一个房子里住的地方和失踪的情况。当他试图告诉他的父亲时，春波将成为一个俘虏，使他的eunshi。
